duties_responsibilities.duty: Moving raw materials, components, and finished goods within the manufacturing plant.
Performing general housekeeping of floors, machinery, and facility.
Assisting with manual labor under the direct supervision of an Operations Supervisor.
Assisting in the manufacturing process of finished goods when needed.
Feeding items into machinery, assembling boxes, and stacking goods on pallets.
Inspecting products for defects and facilitating reprocessing and repair.
Providing labor support as needed and backfilling other positions at the line.
Safety restraints compliance and identification of hazards for cleanup tasks.
Directing and assisting new employees to ensure workplace safety.
Maintaining cleanliness by wiping down machines, equipment, and products.
Lifting materials, final products, and packed items for shipment.
Opening and closing rolls of product during processing.
Separating products according to size, grade, and composition of material used.
Examining products to verify conformance to company standards.
Recording production information and counting finished products for distribution.
Applying stickers, plastics, or tags to products and bundling products for shipment.
